synopsis.native: Rachel a 40 ans, pas d’enfant. Elle aime sa vie : ses élèves du lycée, ses amis, ses ex, ses cours de guitare. En tombant amoureuse d’Ali, elle s’attache à Leila, sa fille de 4 ans. Elle la borde, la soigne, et l’aime comme la sienne. Mais aimer les enfants des autres, c’est un risque à prendre.
synopsis.english: Rachel loves her life, her students, her friends, her ex, her guitar lessons. When she falls in love with Ali, she grows close to his 4-year-old daughter, Leila. She tucks her in, looks after her, and loves her like a mother... which she isn’t. Not yet. Rachel is 40. The desire for a family of her own is growing stronger, and the clock is ticking. Is it too late?
